attributes.additional_details:
There are numerous examples of lies, misinformation and obfuscation from both LEAVE and REMAIN sides of the EU debate. It is unscientific and unacceptable to state that these balance each other out, and continue regardless as this government wants to do.

There is compelling evidence also that interference and misinformation from outside agencies influenced the vote. That evidence indicates that it is likely that the vote was influenced by more than the 4% difference that decided the vote. 

THE FIRST EU REFERENDUM WAS UNDEMOCRATIC.
attributes.background:
A vote, a choice, a decision, an outcome can be said to be democratic only if the PROCESS by which it was arrived at was democratic.

The first EU referendum was undemocratic.
